title: Appeal a Claim Denial
description: A claim was denied for 'not medically necessary'. A denial specialist needs to write and submit an appeal.

tasks.description: Review the denied claim and the payer's reason for denial.
tasks.expected_outcome: Specialist understands the reason for the denial.

tasks.description: Gather supporting clinical documentation from the patient's chart that proves medical necessity.
tasks.expected_outcome: Specialist finds the physician's note and test results that justify the service.

tasks.description: Draft an appeal letter, attach the supporting documentation, and submit it to the payer.
tasks.expected_outcome: The appeal is successfully submitted, and the claim status is updated to 'Appealed'.
